Text.Page:
My friend, I cannot stress enough how dangerous it is to venture into the territory of our rivals. Naturally, though, every time I say this, it strikes listeners as the ideal way to demonstrate one's courage.

So: Steal into Iron Order territory and return with proof of your bravery. Slaying a Darkquaver basilisk, a Darkquaver fimbrilisk, and a Darkquaver fangspawn should suffice.

I see that you survived! You are to be congratulated.

I confess, I was not expecting to see you againâ€”let alone successful!

I am heartened to see that you are the kind of person who knows the distinction between a solemn vow and a foolish boast, my friend.

Truly, the Enlightened Union is honored to have you among us.
